lines: On the night that you have a date with ${loverName}, your best friend from high school, Loretta, has arrived in town unexpectedly. ${loverName} tells you to feel free to bring her along.
Suit yourself. ${loverName} says he'll see you around sometime. He is mad because you broke your date.

Loretta is the domineering type. She takes control of the evening almost immediately after the introductions are made. You and ${loverName} want to go to dinner at a Chinese restaurant. Loretta prefers Italian. In order to appease your
friend, ${loverName} convinces you that Italian would be best.

During the meal you would like to order white wine, but Loretta jumps in and orders a very expensive bottle of red wine. Loretta also orders three main courses, truffles for dessert, and enough after-dinner drinks to anesthetize a horse.

Throughout the evening, the conversation is monopolized by Loretta, who is fond of disagreeing with ${loverName}, then whispering snide comments to you. All in all, this makes the entire evening quite uncomfortable. When the waiter arrives
That is very kind of you. ${loverName} insists on paying for everyone.
You offered once, right? After ${loverName} picks up the check, Loretta says in a loud stage whisper, "He's loaded. Maybe he's in the MOB!"
Loretta thanks ${loverName}, but mentions that it is difficult to find really good Italian food anywhere these days.
${loverName} assumes that everyone is paying for his and her own portion. "Hrrrrrmph," Loretta snorts. "You told me that he was kind and generous. What a CHEAPSKATE," she sneers.
#GIVE HER A PIECE OF YOUR MIND
You don't have the impulse control necessary to do that.
Now you recall why you haven't seen her for so long. She nearly ruined your evening with ${loverName}. But don't worry; he seems to have taken it in stride.
You should have stayed home with your husband tonight.

This is extremely difficult to do, but you have the impulse control necessary to accomplish it. You are a true lady. Later in the evening, after you send Miss Manners home, you get a telephone call from ${loverName}. He understands that
That's fine with ${loverName}. He's had his fill of food and Loretta. At least now he can't be angry about having to pay for her dinner after taking such abuse.
You should have stayed home with your husband tonight.
